episodes.title: Universal Medicine
episodes.description: Let me tell you about the deadliest cult in Australia, Universal Medicine. Music Credit: Kevin Mac Leod- Southern Gothic Sources: Youtube- Esther Rockett- On Unversal Medicine ABC.net.au/news- Clinic Associated with Cult Teaches that People with Disability are Experiencing “Karma” receives thousands in NDIS Funds by Josh Roberson NDIS.gov.au Britannica.com-Pran http://epa-international.com http://www.theschoolofthelivingness.com The Sydney Morning Herald- Self-Styled Healer Serge Benhayon Leads “Socially Harmful Cult”: jury by Michaela Whitbourn YouTube- Serge Benhayon TV BBC-Mother “lost” to Serge Benhayon's Universal Medicine Stroke.org Esotericwomenshealth.com The Esoteric diet – more lethal than ever | UNIVERSAL MEDICINE ACCOUNTABILITY (wordpress.com) YouTube – Prana-Explained Like Never Before by SamatvamSimplified ABC news- Clinic associated with cult that teaches that people with disability are experiencing 'karma' receives thousands in NDIS funds by Josh Robertson Forbes.com https://www.abc.net.au/news/2023-08-02/universal-medicine-clinic-ndis-funds-730/102576660?utm_campaign=abc_news_web&utm_content=link&utm_medium=content_shared&utm_source=abc_news_web Rolling Stones-Serge Benhayon's Universal Medicine by Poppy Reid Abundancetherapycenter.com Sea.museum:Austrailia's Immigration History Mhnsw.au Esotericwomenshealth.com Nominahealth.ca-The Psychology Behind Love Bombing Science Daily- New Study Highlights the Benefit of Touch on Mental and Physical Health Clinic associated with cult that teaches that people with disability are experiencing 'karma' receives thousands in NDIS funds - ABC News
